message: Let's start fair, I get 90% and you get 10%.
I understand you want a larger share, but letting the money devalue hurts you more than me.  I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 30%. How about a 60/40 split?
Time is running out, and the value is dropping fast.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering the devaluation rate.
